about.description:
This package provides an API for querying the distutils metadata written in
the ``PKG-INFO`` file inside a source distriubtion (an ``sdist``) or
a binary distribution (e.g., created by running ``bdist_egg``)
about.summary: Query metadatdata from sdists / bdists / installed packages.

about.description:
This package provides an API for querying the distutils metadata written in
the ``PKG-INFO`` file inside a source distriubtion (an ``sdist``) or
a binary distribution (e.g., created by running ``bdist_egg``)
about.summary: Query metadatdata from sdists / bdists / installed packages.

name: pkginfo
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pkginfo" %}
{% set version = "1.10.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/pkginfo-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5df73835398d10db79f8eecd5cd86b1f6d29317589ea70796994d49399af6297

build:
  entry_points:
    - pkginfo = pkginfo.commandline:main
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.7
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.7

test:
  imports:
    - pkginfo
    - pkginfo.tests
  commands:
    - pip check
    - pkginfo --help
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://code.launchpad.net/~tseaver/pkginfo/trunk
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: Query metadatdata from sdists / bdists / installed packages.
  description: |
    This package provides an API for querying the distutils metadata written in
    the ``PKG-INFO`` file inside a source distriubtion (an ``sdist``) or
    a binary distribution (e.g., created by running ``bdist_egg``)
  doc_url: http://pythonhosted.org/pkginfo/
  dev_url: https://code.launchpad.net/~tseaver/pkginfo/trunk

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jakirkham
    - jankatins
    - mingwandroid
